actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Revolution's Southern most Battlefields National Park.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Revolution's Southern most Battlefields National Part in Duval County, Florida. Empowers the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands and interests and to establish the park after sufficient properties have been acquired. Limits the size of such park to 115 acres.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Revolution's Southern most Battlefields National Park.
